708040.name: Tank Warz! Demo
708040.description:
Tank Warz! is an arcade shooter with a modern look and feel, featuring fast paced tank battles with enemies that wish to prevent you from fulfilling your mission.

Your mission is simple: Destroy the enemy Spawn Portals to stop the evil tank invasion whilst battling your way through different terrains and big bosses.

Featuring pickup items such as Health Packs and "Insta-Bombs" (dropped at random when an enemy tank is destroyed) to help (or sometime hinder!) you in your mission. Additionally featuring an energetic rock backing track and an old-school look, Tank Warz! will engross you in hours of arcade fun - can you beat your high-score?
708040.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
